document_data.name: Rindle
document_data.mainbody: Tracker '''Rindle''' was a member of the [[Cult of the Absolute]] who served as a lookout at a fortress near the [[Shattered Sanctum]].
document_data.Description: Rindle had sickly yellow-green skin. She wore mismatcher [[leather]] rags accented with a feathered hood.
document_data.Possessions: She carried with her a crude [[bow]] crafted from wood and bone.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, the [[Cult of the Absolute]] launched a successful raid agains the [[Waukeen's Rest]] inn, situated along the [[Risen Road]]. Unfortunately for Rindle and a handful of other [[goblin]]s, they were forced to carry out guard duty at a nearby outpost, rather than join in the full celebrations.
